name: Merlin's Card Game
description:
Info

Merlin's Card Game is a simple fun single-player card battler. 

The player takes the role of Merlin and using a selection of spells and must defeat the evil hordes of Mordred. 

What to do?

The objective is simply to kill as many enemies as possible while keeping up with your health and mana.

Simply drag and drop the card you wish to play on the enemy's or Merlin's avatar and the red number indicates cost meanwhile the green indicates how much it does.
